sentences.en: Canalling build savings pool, buy plane burning oil, headhunt casting all spent.
sentences.cn: 可节省挖渠建池 、 买机烧油 、 雇人浇灌等所有花费.

sentences.en: He was headhunted by Barkers last October to build an advertising team.
sentences.cn: 他去年10月被巴克斯挖去组建一个广告团队。

sentences.en: Renowned hi-tech company Huawei is encouraging its staff to headhunt for the company as a sideline, offering a RMB500 bonus for any employee who can recruit qualified personnel.
sentences.cn: 知名企业深圳华为正鼓励员工兼职当公司的猎头，凡是能为公司挖来合格人才的员工，都可以得到500元奖金。

sentences.en: They may headhunt her for the vacant position of Executive Producer.
sentences.cn: 他们可能会挖她去填补执行制片人这一空缺职位。

trans.tran_cn: 野蛮人猎取人头的出征

trans.tran_en: If someone who works for a particular company is headhunted, they leave that company because another company has approached them and offered them another job with better pay and higher status
